src_original: saṃvṛtirhi nāsti śaśaśṛṅgavadabhāvasvabhāvā /  tadā kathamiti cet?  yacca samyaṅ niḥsvabhāvaṃ vastu tasya tannivṛttakāre yā samāropikā bhrāntabuddhiḥ,  saiva saṃvṛtiriti /  athavā yayā tattvamāvriyate [yayā vā tattvabodhaḥ] bādhyate,
tgt_original: saṁvriyate cchādyata ivāsyām anayā vā tattvam iti kṛtvā |

src_original: sā saṃvṛtiriti /  sūtre 'pi tavadutam -  bhāvā vidyanti saṃvṛtyā paramārthe na bhāvakāḥ /
tgt_original: tathā coktaṁ sūtre- bhāvā jāyanti saṁvṛtyā paramārthe niḥsvabhāvakāḥ |

src_original: niḥsvabhāveṣu yā bhrāntistatsatyaṃ saṃvṛtirbhavet //
tgt_original: niḥsvabhāveṣu yā bhrāntiḥ sā tathyāsaṁvṛtir matā ||  iti |

src_original: tannirvṛtatvāttadupadarśitaṃ sarvaṃ khalu vastu saṃvṛtimātramevetyuktam /
tgt_original: tadbhavatvād vā sarva etadupadarśitā vyalīkā bhāvāḥ sāṁvṛtā ucyante |

src_original: sāpyanādikalīnabhrāntavāsanāparipākajarūpaiva /  tayā sarveṣu sattveṣu pāramarthikavastusvabhāva ivopadarśyate,  atastadbuddhayadhikārena sarvaṃ hi mithyāvastu saṃvṛtisanmātrameveti /
tgt_original: sā cānādivibhramavāsanāparipākavaśād asato bhāvato bhāvān sata ivopadarśayanty upajāyate sarvaprāṇabhṛtāṁ yatas tasmād abhiprāyavaśāt sarva evālīkarūpā bhāvāḥ saṁvṛtisanta ucyante |

src_original: tacca naiva paramārthato vastusvabhāvam,
tgt_original: na punar eṣāṁ bhāvato bhāvarūpatvam,

src_original: yathābhāsamanavasthitatvāt /
tgt_original: yathāpratibhāsam atattvāt |

src_original: naiva ca śaśaśṛṅgavat tadatyantābhāvasvabhāvamapi,
tgt_original: nāpi śaśaviṣāṇavad atyantābhāvarūpatā,

src_original: avicārato ramaṇīyatvenāvabhāsamānatvāt /
tgt_original: avicāraramaṇīyākāreṇa pratibhāsanāt ||

src_original: tathā sarvavastuṣu mithyākārena jñānena yadāropitaṃ tat saṃvṛtisatyamiti vyavahriyate /  māyāpuruṣādau abhrāntairyathā vyavasthīyate tathaiva sarvavastuṣu yaḥ svabhāvaḥ samyakpramāṇaiḥ sampratipādyate,
tgt_original: ato yathoktabhrāntirūpā saṁvṛtir ajanmano'pi bhāvato bhāvān jāyamānān ivopadarśayati yatas tena tadāśrayavaśāt saṁvṛtyotpadyante bhāvā ity ucyate

src_original: pratyakṣeṇa va paramparayā vā kṛta bhedā api santi /
tgt_original: sākṣātpāraṁparyakṛtas tu viśeṣaḥ |

src_original: tābhyāṃ sarvāṇi vastūni anutpannatvenaiva jñāyante /  itthaṃ paramārthato 'nutpada iti samyagjñānena asiddhotpāda ityeva vakṣyate /
tgt_original: tadvaśād ete sarvabhāvā anutpannā eva pratīyante |  samyagjñānasaṁsiddho naiṣām utpāda ity uktaṁ bhavati ||

src_original: yato hi cintanotpannasya prajñātattvasyāviparītatvena niyatacintanagatasamyakpramāṇabalotpannaṃ tathaiva bhāvanābalotpannamapi kalpitamevocyate,  yato hi tattvārthapratyakṣastāvat samyagvicārahetukastanniṣyandabhūtaśca bhavati /
tgt_original: tathā hy aviparītatattvanidhyānapravṛttasamyak- pramāṇabalabhāvinī cintāmayī prajñā tathā bhāvanāmayy api sākṣāttattvārthānuvicāritayā tanniṣyandatayā vā vicāra ucyate |

src_original: yāni khalu tattvarthaparāṅmukhani mithyākāropagṛhītāni jñānāni,  tāni sarvāṇi tadviparītatvād akalpitānītyucyante,
tgt_original: tathārthaparāṅmukhaṁ tu sarvam eva tadviparyayād alīkākāropagrāhi jñānam avicāraḥ |

src_original: tāni naiva nirvikalpāni,  naiva va kalpanāmātrarahitāni /
tgt_original: na tu nirvikalpakaṁ jñānaṁ nāpi vicārābhāvamātram |

src_original: atastatprasiddhasvabhāvatvāt sarvāṇi mithyākārasvabhāvāni vastūni saṃvṛtirityabhidhīyante /
tgt_original: (3) atas tatprasiddharūpatvāt sarva evālīkarūpo bhāvaḥ sāṁvṛtaḥ ||

src_original: [65] 'saṃvṛtirlokaprasiddhā' ityādikaṃ yaduktaṃ tacca doṣarahitameva,  sarveṣāṃ lokaprasidhārthānāṃ saṃvṛtitvenābhyupagamāt /
tgt_original: sarvalokaprasiddhasya sarvasyaivārthasya sāṁvṛtatveneṣṭatvāt |

src_original: nāpi sarve 'rthāḥ sarvendriyagocarāḥ,  kenacit kasyacideva grahaṇāt /
tgt_original: na ca sarvo'rtho'pi sarvasyaivendriyasya gocaraḥ kasyacid eva kaiścid īkṣaṇāt ||

src_original: ataḥ karmaphalādīnāṃ pṛthakśo niyatavyavasthā yā atyantaparokṣā,
tgt_original: ato'tyantaparokṣasya sarvākārapratiniyatakarmaphalāder vyavasthā sarvajñajñānata evānyasya punar itarajñānato'pi ||  yat punaḥ kaiścic chāstrakāraiḥ pratītim ullaṁghya bhāvānāṁ nityādirūpam upakalpitaṁ tat mithyāsaṁvṛtisad ucyate |  pratītito'pi tasyāsattvāt |  yat punaḥ pratītyanusārataḥ prakalpitam,  yathā- nāstīha sattva ātmā ca dharmās tv ete sahetukā iti,

src_original: ato vastūnamanekatve 'pi praṇetṛbhiryadyapyanekasvabhavatvena kalpitāni,  tathāpi teṣāṃ svabhāve naiva parasparavirodhaḥ /
tgt_original: tena saty apy ekatra vastuni śāstrakārāṇām anekarūpavyārope vastuno na pa- rasparaviruddhānekasvabhāvatāprasaṅgaḥ ||

src_original: [66] yacca 'māyārthaḥ saṃvṛtyarthaḥ' ityuktaṃ tadapyasatyārthe māyārthasya svīkārād doṣahitameva,
tgt_original: māyārtho vā saṁvṛtyarthaḥ |

src_original: māyārthasya mithyājñānārthasve jñānavastuni naiva prasaṅgaḥ,
tgt_original: bhrāntajñānarūpe 'pi ca māyārthe jñānasya na vastutāprasaṅgaḥ |

src_original: mithyākāropagṛhītatvenāvabhāsanāt,
tgt_original: alīkākāropagraheṇa tasya bhāsanāt,

src_original: satyāsatyayoḥ parasparaviruddhatvācca /
tgt_original: satyālīkarūpayoś ca parasparaviruddhatvāt |

src_original: mithyāsvarūpasyāpi satyatvenāvabhāse sati naiva jñānaṃ bhrāntaṃ syāt,  tasminnekasvabhāvo 'pi naiva yukturūpaḥ,
tgt_original: tenālīkarūpatāyā api satyatāpatter na bhrāntatā jñānasya bhāvet |

src_original: asatyasvabhāvasya mithyātvād bhrānte sati naiva jñānaṃ syāt,
tgt_original: bhrāntatve vāsatyarūpatāyā apy alīkatvān na jñānasya satyatā bhavet |

src_original: tayoḥ sarvātmanā parasparaviruddhatvāt,  ekasminnavayavāvayavibhāvasyāsambhavācca /
tgt_original: sarvātmanā tayoḥ parasparam anānātvād ekasyāṅgāṅgibhāvāsaṁbhavāt |

src_original: ato mithyāsvabhāvatvājjñānasvarūpe 'ntarjñeyavādināṃ mate mahān viśeṣo [bhedaḥ] jāyate /
tgt_original: (4) ato jñānasyāpy alīkatvād antarjñeyanayād asya mahān viśeṣaḥ ||

src_original: sugatamateṣvapi jagadidaṃ śabdamātramevetyuktam /
tgt_original: na hi śabdamātraṁ saṁvṛtir iti kasyāpi saugatasya matam |

src_original: yathoktam sūtre -
tgt_original: iti sūtre'bhihitam,

src_original: sūtre sūtre vikalpoktaṃ saṃjñānāmāntareṇa ca /  abhidhanavirnimuktabhidheyaṃ na lakṣyate //  ye tāvadabhidhānaṃ vastubhūtam,  abhidheyaṃ ca tadatiriktamiti kalpayanti,  teṣāmevaṃ kalpayatāṃ mataniṣedhāryamevābhidheyaṃ kalpanāyāṃ pratiṣṭhitamityupadarśitaṃ saṃjñāmātre pratiṣṭhitamityādinā /
tgt_original: tatrāpi ye vastubhūtam evābhidhānam abhidheyaṁ ca tatpṛthagbhūtam api kalpayanti tanmatapratiṣedhāya kalpanāpratiṣṭhitatvam evābhidhānābhidheyayor upadarśitam |

src_original: tasyāmavabhāsyamānaṃ nāmaivābhidhānam,  arthastvabhidheyaḥ /  ato 'bhidhānādatiriktabhidheyaṃ nāstītyuktam /
tgt_original: saṁjñā hy atra kalpanā |

src_original: kalpanājñāne 'vabhāsyamānamabhidhānamatra nāmaśabdenābhipretaṃ,  na tu śrotravijñānavijñeyaḥ śabdaḥ tasyābhidhānatvābhāvāt /
tgt_original: kalpanārūpam evābhidhānaṁ nāmaśabdenābhipretam |  na tu śrotrajñānapratibhāsy arthasyāvācakatvāt |

src_original: etāvanmātratve sati rūpadīnāṃ sarve vividhābhāsā na setsyanti,
tgt_original: tanmātratve ca viśvasya rūpādivaicitryapratibhāso na bhavet |
